sentences.sContent: Goldfinches like thistle seeds, hulled sunflower seeds, and oil-type sunflower seeds.
sentences.sContent_eng: Goldfinches like thistle seeds, hulled sunflower seeds, and oil-type sunflower seeds.
sentences.sCn: 金翅雀喜欢蓟的种子、带壳向日葵籽和向日葵油籽。

sentences.sContent: The lace design incorporated rose, thistle, daffodil and shamrock — the emblems of England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland.
sentences.sContent_eng: The lace design incorporated rose, thistle, daffodil and shamrock — the emblems of England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland.
sentences.sCn: 蕾丝图案上有玫瑰、蓟、水仙花和三叶草（英格兰、苏格兰、威尔士和北爱尔兰的象征）。

sentences.sContent: The 10-piece set features a raised and gilded oak leaf border with acorns and the national symbols of the daffodil, rose and thistle on a pale blue base.
sentences.sContent_eng: The 10-piece set features a raised and gilded oak leaf border with acorns and the national symbols of the daffodil, rose and thistle on a pale blue base.
sentences.sCn: 这个陶瓷10件套的边缘用向上攀升的镀金橡树叶和橡树果作装饰，中间是国家的标志：水仙花，玫瑰和淡蓝色基底上的蓟。

phrases.pCn: [生]水飞蓟；[生]奶蓟草；[生]牛奶蓟

trans.tranCn: 蓟（一种野生植物，叶片带刺，开紫花）
trans.tranOther: a wild plant which has leaves with sharp points and purple or white furry flowers
